subject: RE: Springfield camera locations
body:
Thank you 

 

 

Jake Burke

Captain � Investigations Division

Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401

(541) 682-5895 work

 

 



 

From: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com> 
Sent: Thursday, January 23, 2025 2:29 PM
To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov>; BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: Springfield camera locations

 

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi gentlemen,

 

Here is the link to Springfield's Flock map. https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/3452ad2c-56bf-4b5c-89f5--flocksafety-com-planning-portal-deployment-tracker-public-00a6986e5 I was told they're pretty certain about these locations. We'll make sure we are placing your cameras with these in mind so we aren't doubling up. 

 

At first glance, these cameras look to be close to the two cities' borders

 

F#005 Centennial Blvd @ Anderson Ln EB

F#006 Centennial Blvd @ Anderson Ln WB

F#007 Harlow Rd @ Dornoch St EB

F#001 Harlow Rd @ Dornoch St WB

LR#005 Beltline Rd @ Gateway St WB

F#032 Gateway St @ Beltline Rd SB

F#031 Gateway St @ Kruse Way NB

F#057 Beltline Rd @ Hutton St EB

F#004 Main St @ Franklin Blvd WB

F#003 S A St @ Franklin Blvd EB

	
 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/3452ad2c-56bf-4b5c-89f5--com 

Caroline Fraher
Territory Sales Manager
